parameters.command:
=set -Eeuo pipefail

############# CONFIG #############
# Como a imagem deve se ajustar ao canvas: contain | cover | stretch
SCALE_MODE="${SCALE_MODE:-stretch}"
# ...

# => PAISAGEM (deitado)
CANVAS_W=1920
CANVAS_H=1080

BG_COLOR="black"
TEXT_COLOR="white"

# Para texto com QUEBRA automática, uso de legendas ASS (libass)
FONT_FILE="/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf"
FONT_SIZE=96

SAFE_MARGIN=96     # margens (px) esquerda/direita/superior/inferior
FADE_SEC=0.50     # usado só no xfade de cena (imagem->imagem)
X_PAUSE_SEC=2.5
SCENE_CARD_SEC=1.2
SCENE_XFADE_SEC=0.6
SHOW_SCENE_CARDS=0
SCENE_CARD_TEXT_PREFIX="Scene"

# >>> ÚNICA ALTERAÇÃO: mensagem configurável da pausa curta
PREPARE_MSG="${PREPARE_MSG:-"Get ready. Repeat right after."}"

X264_PRESET="veryfast"
X264_CRF=21
AUDIO_BR="160k"
##################################

# Workdir temporário
TMPROOT="/home/node/download"
mkdir -p "$TMPROOT"
TMPDIR="$(mktemp -d "$TMPROOT/.shadow_XXXXXX")"
trap 'rm -rf "$TMPDIR"' EXIT

LIST="$TMPDIR/list.txt"; : > "$LIST"

# Fonte fallback (para bg quando não houver imagem)
if [ ! -f "$FONT_FILE" ]; then
  if   [ -f "/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf" ]; then
    FONT_FILE="/home/node/assets/COMMON/fonts/impact.ttf"
  elif [ -f "/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans.ttf" ]; then
    FONT_FILE="/usr/share/fonts/truetype/dejavu/DejaVuSans.ttf"
  fi
fi

# =========== Entrada JSON (todos os itens do nó anterior) ===========
IN_JSON="$TMPDIR/in.json"
cat > "$IN_JSON" <<'JSON'
{{ JSON.stringify($input.all().map(i => i.json)) }}
JSON

if [ ! -s "$IN_JSON" ]; then
  echo "ERRO: Entrada JSON vazia. Garanta que este nó recebe o array do nó anterior e Execute Once = ON."
  exit 1
fi

# ==================== FUNÇÕES ====================
probe_dur () { ffprobe -hide_banner -loglevel error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 "$1" 2>/dev/null | tr -d '\r' || true; }

scale_to_canvas () {
  case "$SCALE_MODE" in
    cover)
      echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:force_original_aspect_ratio=increase,crop=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}"
      ;;
    stretch)
      echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}"
      ;;
    *)
      echo "scale=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,pad=${CANVAS_W}:${CANVAS_H}:(ow-iw)/2:(oh-ih)/2:color=${BG_COLOR}"
      ;;
  esac
}

# Gera um .ass centralizado (Alignment 5), wrap automático e SEM espaçamento entre letras
make_ass_file () { # $1: caminho .ass ; $2: texto
  local ASS="$1" RAW="$2"
  local TXT
  TXT="$(printf '%s' "$RAW" | sed -e 's/[{}]/()/g' -e 's/\\/\\\\/g')"

  cat > "$ASS" <<EOF
[Script Info]
ScriptType: v4.00+
PlayResX: ${CANVAS_W}
PlayResY: ${CANVAS_H}
ScaledBorderAndShadow: yes
WrapStyle: 0

[V4+ Styles]
; Spacing=0 (sem espaçamento de letras). Outline para legibilidade.
Format: Name, Fontname, Fontsize, PrimaryColour, SecondaryColour, OutlineColour, BackColour, Bold, Italic, Underline, StrikeOut, ScaleX, ScaleY, Spacing, Angle, BorderStyle, Outline, Shadow, Alignment, MarginL, MarginR, MarginV, Encoding
Style: Default, Impact, ${FONT_SIZE}, &H00FFFFFF, &H000000FF, &H00000000, &H7F000000, -1, 0, 0, 0, 100, 100, 0, 0, 1, 2.5, 0, 5, ${SAFE_MARGIN}, ${SAFE_MARGIN}, ${SAFE_MARGIN}, 0

[Events]
Format: Layer, Start, End, Style, Name, MarginL, MarginR, MarginV, Effect, Text
Dialogue: 0,0:00:00.00,9:59:59.99,Default,,0000,0000,0000,,${TXT}
EOF
}

# BG puro (sem fade — fade só quando troca IMAGEM)
make_bg_clip () { # $1 IMG, $2 OUT, $3 DUR
  local IMG="$1" OUT="$2" DUR="$3"
  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas),fps=30,format=yuv420p,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]format=yuv420p,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  fi
}

# Texto + Áudio (SEM fade quando só muda o texto)
make_text_over_audio () { # $1 SRC, $2 OUT, $3 TXT, $4 IMG
  local SRC="$1" OUT="$2" TXT="$3" IMG="$4" DUR ASSF
  DUR=$(probe_dur "$SRC"); [ -z "$DUR" ] && DUR=0
  ASSF="$OUT.ass"; make_ass_file "$ASSF" "$TXT"

  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -i "$SRC" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" \
      -filter_complex "[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1,format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -i "$SRC" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" \
      -filter_complex "[1:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1,format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[0:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  fi
}

# Silêncio + Texto (SEM fade quando só muda o texto)
make_silence_with_text () { # $1 OUT, $2 DUR, $3 TXT, $4 IMG
  local OUT="$1" DUR="$2" TXT="$3" IMG="$4" ASSF
  ASSF="$OUT.ass"; make_ass_file "$ASSF" "$TXT"

  if [ -n "${IMG:-}" ] && [ -f "$IMG" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$IMG" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[bg];[bg]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1,format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "color=size=${CANVAS_W}x${CANVAS_H}:rate=30:color=${BG_COLOR}" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]ass='$ASSF':shaping=1,format=yuv420p,fps=30,setsar=1[v];[1:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  fi
}

# XFADE ENTRE IMAGENS (apenas quando muda de cena)
make_scene_xfade () { # $1 P, $2 N, $3 OUT, $4 DUR
  local P="$1" N="$2" OUT="$3" DUR="$4"
  if [ -n "${P:-}" ] && [ -f "$P" ] && [ -n "${N:-}" ] && [ -f "$N" ]; then
    ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y \
      -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$P" -loop 1 -t "$DUR" -i "$N" -f lavfi -t "$DUR" -i "anullsrc=channel_layout=stereo:sample_rate=44100" \
      -filter_complex "[0:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[a0];[1:v]$(scale_to_canvas)[a1];[a0][a1]xfade=transition=fade:duration=${DUR}:offset=0,format=yuv420p,setsar=1,fps=30[v];[2:a]aformat=sample_fmts=fltp:sample_rates=44100:channel_layouts=stereo[a]" \
      -map "[v]" -map "[a]" -c:v libx264 -preset "$X264_PRESET" -crf $X264_CRF -pix_fmt yuv420p -movflags +faststart -c:a aac -b:a "$AUDIO_BR" -shortest "$OUT"
  else
    make_bg_clip "${P:-}" "$OUT" "$DUR"
  fi
}

# =========== Constrói TSV a partir do JSON ===========
BUILD_JS="$TMPDIR/build.js"
cat > "$BUILD_JS" <<'JS'
const fs = require('fs');

const path = process.argv[2] || process.argv[1];
if (!path) { console.error('sem caminho JSON'); process.exit(1); }

let arr;
try { arr = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path, 'utf8')); }
catch(e){ console.error('JSON inválido:', e.message); process.exit(2); }

if (!Array.isArray(arr) || !arr.length) { console.error('JSON vazio'); process.exit(3); }

const ch  = arr[0].CHANNEL_NAME || 'CANAL_SHADOWING';
const vid = arr[0].videoId || String(Date.now());

console.log(`#DEST_DIR=/home/node/download/${ch}/${vid}`);
console.log(`#FINAL_OUT=/home/node/download/${ch}/${vid}/shadow_${Date.now()}.mp4`);

function exists(p){ try{ fs.accessSync(p); return true; }catch{ return false; } }

for (const it of arr) {
  const scene = it.sceneId ?? 0;
  const audio = it.videoMetaData?.file || '';
  const text  = String(it.audioSubtitle ?? '').replace(/\r?\n/g,' ');
  const baseCh = it.CHANNEL_NAME || ch;
  const baseVid= it.videoId || vid;
  const guess  = `/home/node/download/${baseCh}/${baseVid}/${scene}_${baseVid}.png`;
  const img    = exists(guess) ? guess : '';
  console.log([audio, text, scene, img].join('|'));
}
JS

TSV_RAW="$TMPDIR/raw.tsv"
node "$BUILD_JS" "$IN_JSON" > "$TSV_RAW"

DEST_DIR=$(grep '^#DEST_DIR=' "$TSV_RAW" | head -n1 | cut -d'=' -f2-)
FINAL_OUT=$(grep '^#FINAL_OUT=' "$TSV_RAW" | head -n1 | cut -d'=' -f2-)
[ -z "${DEST_DIR:-}" ] && { echo "Falha ao obter DEST_DIR do JSON"; exit 1; }
mkdir -p "$DEST_DIR"

DATA_FILE="$TMPDIR/data.tsv"
grep -v '^#' "$TSV_RAW" > "$DATA_FILE"

# ============== Loop principal =================
last_scene=""; last_img=""; idx=0; read_first_line=1

exec 9< "$DATA_FILE"
while IFS='|' read -r -u 9 SRC TXT SCENE IMG; do
  [ -z "${SRC:-}" ] && continue
  DUR=$(probe_dur "$SRC"); [ -z "$DUR" ] && DUR=0

  # XFADE somente quando a IMAGEM muda (mudança de cena)
  if [ "$read_first_line" -eq 0 ] && [ "$SCENE" != "$last_scene" ]; then
    XF="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_xfade_${last_scene}_${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_scene_xfade "$last_img" "$IMG" "$XF" "$SCENE_XFADE_SEC"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$XF" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi

  # card opcional de cena (também sem fade)
  if [ "$SHOW_SCENE_CARDS" -eq 1 ] && { [ "$read_first_line" -eq 1 ] || [ "$SCENE" != "$last_scene" ]; }; then
    CARD="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_scene_${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_silence_with_text "$CARD" "$SCENE_CARD_SEC" "${SCENE_CARD_TEXT_PREFIX} ${SCENE}" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$CARD" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi

  read_first_line=0; last_scene="$SCENE"; last_img="$IMG"

  ###############################################
  # MUDANÇA: cena 0 SEM repetições/pausas
  ###############################################
  if [ "$SCENE" -eq 0 ]; then
    # Apenas 1x play com texto sobre o áudio
    P1="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_play_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P1" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$P1" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  else
    # Padrão antigo (3 passes + pausas)
    # 1) play
    P1="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_play1_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P1" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$P1" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

    # 2) pausa curta (mensagem PREPARE_MSG)
    PX="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_pauseX_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_silence_with_text "$PX" "$X_PAUSE_SEC" "$PREPARE_MSG" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$PX" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

    # 3) pausa do tamanho do áudio
    PY="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_pauseY_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_silence_with_text "$PY" "$DUR" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$PY" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))

    # 4) replay
    P3="$TMPDIR/part_$(printf "%03d" "$idx")_play3_s${SCENE}.mp4"
    make_text_over_audio "$SRC" "$P3" "$TXT" "$IMG"
    printf "file '%s'\n" "$P3" >> "$LIST"; idx=$((idx+1))
  fi
done
exec 9<&-

# ============== Concat final ====================
ffmpeg -nostdin -hide_banner -loglevel error -y -f concat -safe 0 -i "$LIST" -c copy -movflags +faststart "$FINAL_OUT"
echo "OK: $FINAL_OUT"

json.theme: indicação de locais, direções, pontos de referência, como chegar em algum lugar
json.mode: Diálogo fictício de um turista brasileiro nos estados unidos.

json.audioSubtitle: Theme: historical journey in an old town. Shadowing in 3 passes — first, listen attentively; second, repeat after the reading; third, speak together. Keep a steady pace, breathe, and articulate clearly.
Thomas: I remember when I first arrived in our old town. I was eager to explore its famous landmarks. "Where do I go next?" I asked an elderly local near the stone bridge.
Emily: "Walk straight ahead, Thomas. Soon, you'll see the ancient clock tower on your right. It has stood for over a hundred years," she replied with a gentle smile.

Thomas: I followed her words. I passed the old market square and a small park filled with history. "This way, and then turn left at the old fountain," Emily added. Her directions felt like a journey through time.

Emily: "Notice the row of old oak trees lining the cobblestone street. They have seen many changes in the town. At the corner, a red brick building marks the entrance to the historical museum. It is a landmark of our past," she explained.

Thomas: I glanced back and saw that I was nearly at the familiar archway. My heart raced with excitement as each landmark told its story. "I am on the main road now," I remarked. "I see that arch and then a narrow alley that leads to the old library."
Emily: "Yes, you got it right. The library has been here since the early days. Follow the alley, and at the end you will reach the square that locals call the Heart of History," she said warmly.
Thomas: I absorbed every detail. Her directions were clear and filled with memories. I felt connected to the past as I stepped forward on my historical journey.
